mapper.select: SELECT a.roleId, a.authority FROM authorities a JOIN users u ON a.userId = u.id WHERE a.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (loginId, username, password, phone, email, photo) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{phone})
INSERT INTO volunteerInfo (volunteerId, InfoTitle, eventId, SendTime, InfoBody) VALUES (#{volunteerId}, #{infoTitle}, #{eventId}, #{sendTime}, #{infoBody})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET loginId = users.loginId, username = users.username, phone = users.phone, email = users.email, password = users.password, enabled = users.enabled, lastLoginTime = users.lastLoginTime, registerTime = users.registerTime, photo = #{s} WHERE id = #{volunteerId};
mapper.select: SELECT users.* FROM eventregistrations INNER JOIN volunteer ON eventregistrations.volunteerId = volunteer.id INNER JOIN users ON volunteer.userId = users.id WHERE eventregistrations.id = #{id}
